entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of ice pellets mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
